name: Mac & Cheese Popcorn
description: Family movie nights just got cheesier! Set up your favourite movie, snuggle up, and indulge in this cheesy popcorn goodness. Don’t forget to save some for a special school lunchbox treat.
preparation: In a small saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Stir in seasoning until combined.
Pour popped popcorn in a large bowl. Add cheese mixture; toss to coat.
tips: Prep popcorn in Multipurpose Steamer. Add 1⁄3 cup popcorn kernels; cover and microwave on high 5–6 min, or until popping has slowed down.

products.name: Mac & Cheese Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: An all-time best-seller, this is the Mac & Cheese you’ve been craving – and that your kids will LOVE to eat! Creamy, cheesy, and super comforting, it’s free of unnecessary additives and packed with flavour thanks to real cheddar cheese. Take it from the stovetop (or microwave) to the table in under 10 minutes and dig in!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
